title: Capture a Base
description: Successfully capture any facility or outpost.

title: Defend a Base
description: Prevent the enemy from capturing a facility you own.

title: Spawn Beacon Deployed
description: Deploy a spawn beacon for your squad.

title: Destroy a Vehicle
description: Eliminate any enemy vehicle using C4, rockets, or weapon fire.

title: Repair Ally Vehicle
description: Use your repair tool to fully repair an allied vehicle.

title: Revive a Teammate
description: Bring a fallen ally back into battle with your medical applicator.

title: Kill Streak
description: Achieve 5 kills without dying.

title: Vehicle Kill Streak
description: Destroy 3 enemy vehicles without dying.

title: Air to Air Kill
description: Shoot down an enemy aircraft while flying.

title: Headshot
description: Score a headshot kill with any weapon.

title: Spot Enemy
description: Spot an enemy soldier or vehicle for your squad.

title: Capture Point Hero
description: Earn defense or capture points while staying on the point.

title: Squad Spawn
description: A squad member spawns on your beacon, vehicle, or spawn point.

title: Destroy a Generator
description: Overload and destroy a base generator.

title: Hack a Terminal
description: Use the Infiltrator class to hack a terminal.

title: Use a MAX Suit
description: Deploy as a MAX and score a kill.

title: Call for Ammo
description: Request and receive ammo from an Engineer.

title: Squad Revive Chain
description: Revive 3 teammates in quick succession.

title: Vehicle Roadkill
description: Run over an enemy with a ground vehicle.

title: Sunderer Deployment
description: Deploy a Sunderer that allies use as a spawn point.

title: Air Support Kill
description: Get a kill with a Liberator or Valkyrie gun.

title: Tank Duel Winner
description: Win a 1v1 tank fight.

title: Gunship Hunter
description: Destroy a Liberator or Galaxy.

title: Assist Master
description: Earn 10 assist points in one life.

title: Objective Push
description: Join a successful push that flips a point under heavy fire.
